text: The 2016 Grand Prix Cycliste de Montreal was the 7th edition of the Grand Prix Cycliste de Montreal road bicycle race. The race took place on 11 September 2016.http://www.uci.ch/road/calendar/#date=20160801&view;=list&categ;=300&country;=0&classc;=0 ==Teams== The eighteen UCI World Tour teams are automatically entitled and obliged to start the race. The race organisation gave out a few wildcards to some UCI Professional Continental teams. ==Race report== ==Results== {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccccff;" ! !Cyclist !Team !Time !UCI World Tour Points |- | 1 | | |align="right"| 5h 27' 04" |align="center"| 80 |- | 2 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 60 |- | 3 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 50 |- | 4 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 40 |- | 5 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 30 |- | 6 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 22 |- | 7 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 14 |- | 8 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 10 |- | 9 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 6 |- | 10 | | |align="right"| s.t. |align="center"| 2 |} ==References== Category:Grand Prix Cycliste de Montréal Category:2016 UCI World Tour Category:2016 in Canadian sports Category:2016 in Quebec Category:September 2016 sports events in Canada
